verses.text: They \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* put \w away|strong="H7971"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and she \w go|strong="H1980"\w* from him, and become \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w*, shall he return unto her \w again|strong="H7725"\w*? shall not that \w land|strong="H0776"\w* be \w greatly|strong="H2610"\w* \w polluted|strong="H2610"\w*? but thou hast played the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* with \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w lovers|strong="H7453"\w*; yet return \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 3.1 \ft They say: Heb. Saying\f*

Lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* unto the high \w places|strong="H8205"\w*, and \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w where|strong="H0375"\w* thou hast not been \w lien|strong="H7693"\w* with. In the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* hast thou \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* for them, as the \w Arabian|strong="H6163"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; and thou hast \w polluted|strong="H2610"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* with thy \w whoredoms|strong="H2184"\w* and with thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

Therefore the \w showers|strong="H7241"\w* have been \w withholden|strong="H4513"\w*, and there hath been no latter \w rain|strong="H4456"\w*; and thou hadst a \w whore’s|strong="H2181"\w* \w forehead|strong="H4696"\w*, thou \w refusedst|strong="H3985"\w* to be \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w*.
Wilt thou not from this time \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto me, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, thou \add art\add* the \w guide|strong="H0441"\w* of my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*?

Will he \w reserve|strong="H5201"\w* \add his anger\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*? will he \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \add it\add* to the \w end|strong="H5331"\w*? Behold, thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* evil \w things|strong="H7451"\w* as thou \w couldest|strong="H3201"\w*.

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* also unto me in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, Hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \add that\add* which \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? she is gone \w up|strong="H1980"\w* upon every \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* and \w under|strong="H8478"\w* every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and there hath played the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*.

And I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* she had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all these \add things\add*, \w Turn|strong="H7725"\w* thou unto me. But she \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* not. And her \w treacherous|strong="H0901"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*.

And I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, when for all the \w causes|strong="H0182"\w* whereby \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* committed \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* I had put her \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w given|strong="H5414"\w* her a \w bill|strong="H5612"\w* of \w divorce|strong="H3748"\w*; yet her \w treacherous|strong="H0898"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* not, but \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and played the \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* also.

And it came to pass through the \w lightness|strong="H6963"\w* of her \w whoredom|strong="H2184"\w*, that she \w defiled|strong="H2610"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and committed \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* and with \w stocks|strong="H6086"\w*.\f + \fr 3.9 \ft lightness: or, fame\f*

And yet for all this her \w treacherous|strong="H0901"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* hath not \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* unto me with her whole \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, but \w feignedly|strong="H8267"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 3.10 \ft feignedly: Heb. in falsehood\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, The \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w justified|strong="H6663"\w* \w herself|strong="H5315"\w* more than \w treacherous|strong="H0898"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

¶ \w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, thou \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; \add and\add* I will not cause mine \w anger|strong="H6440"\w* to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* upon you: for I \add am\add* \w merciful|strong="H2623"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add and\add* I will not \w keep|strong="H5201"\w* \add anger\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Only \w acknowledge|strong="H3045"\w* thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, that thou hast \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and hast \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* to the \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* under every \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and ye have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w Turn|strong="H7725"\w*, O \w backsliding|strong="H7726"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for I am \w married|strong="H1166"\w* unto you: and I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* you \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of a \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* of a \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you to \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*:

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you \w pastors|strong="H7462"\w* according to mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, which shall \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* you with \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w* and \w understanding|strong="H7919"\w*.

And it shall come to pass, when ye be \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* and \w increased|strong="H6509"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, in those \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, they shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w* no more, The \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: neither shall it \w come|strong="H5927"\w* to \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*: neither shall they \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* it; neither shall they \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* \add it;\add* neither shall \add that\add* be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* any more.  +  r 3.16  t come to mind: Heb. come upon the heart *  +  r 3.16  t that…: or, it be magnified *

At that \w time|strong="H6256"\w* they shall \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall be \w gathered|strong="H6960"\w* unto it, to the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: neither shall they \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* any more \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of their \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.  +  r 3.17  t imagination: or, stubbornness *

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* shall \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* with the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and they shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that I have given for an \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* unto your \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 3.18 \ft with: or, to\f*\f + \fr 3.18 \ft given…: or, caused your fathers to possess\f*

But I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How shall I \w put|strong="H7896"\w* thee among the \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w pleasant|strong="H2532"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, a \w goodly|strong="H6643"\w* \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w* of the \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* of \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*? and I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* me, My \w father|strong="H0001"\w*; and shalt not turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from \w me|strong="H0310"\w*.\f + \fr 3.19 \ft from me: Heb. from after me\f*\f + \fr 3.19 \ft a goodly…: Heb. an heritage of glory, or, beauty\f*\f + \fr 3.19 \ft pleasant…: Heb. land of desire\f*

¶ \w Surely|strong="H0403"\w* \add as\add* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* departeth from her \w husband|strong="H7453"\w*, so have ye dealt \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* with me, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 3.20 \ft husband: Heb. friend\f*

A \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* upon the high \w places|strong="H8205"\w*, \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* \add and\add* \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: for they have \w perverted|strong="H5753"\w* their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \add and\add* they have \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* their \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, ye \w backsliding|strong="H7726"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \add and\add* I will \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* your \w backslidings|strong="H4878"\w*. Behold, we \w come|strong="H0857"\w* unto thee; for thou \add art\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Truly|strong="H0403"\w* in \w vain|strong="H8267"\w* \add is salvation hoped for\add* from the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, \add and from\add* the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*: \w truly|strong="H0403"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* the \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* hath \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* the \w labour|strong="H3018"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* from our \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*; their \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and their \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*.

We lie \w down|strong="H7901"\w* in our \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*, and our \w confusion|strong="H3639"\w* \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* us: for we have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, we and our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, from our \w youth|strong="H5271"\w* even unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
